programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The competitors take a road trip to one of Ireland's premiere links courses where the wind and two players' emotions try to blow the teams apart. Distrust and dislike forces one team to put emotions aside for the betterment of the group.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Competitors fight to remain and keep their hopes alive. Smelling blood, one team looks to eradicate the opposition.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: With the team competition complete, the final four realize that the end is near and the title is now within their reach. A long awaited match between former teammates spells disaster for one, leaving the other fighting for their life.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The final two contestants battle it out for the title of champion.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Learn creative drills to train a better downswing and find out how Michael Jackson's moonwalk will improve your impact; Devan will also reveal a tip for the transition used by Viktor Hovland.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake will reveal the most important swing angles and teach you how to achieve those positions; learn Devan's favorite drills for ideal angles in the backswing, downswing, at impact and in the finish.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake is teaching how to use ground forces to maximize your power; learn how a tennis ball, yoga block, kettlebell and exercise band can be used to train for more distance.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches how to coordinate the lead and trail side body parts to become a better ball striker.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Learn vital correct information and creative drills to improve grip pressure, footwork, trail arm in the takeaway and head movement throughout the swing.

programme.title: Home Course Advantage
programme.desc: Host Will Lowery and several notable figures in golf team up to tell the stories of talented young golfers in underserved communities and help them propel their game forward.

programme.title: Home Course Advantage
programme.desc: After enduring seven rounds of high dose chemotherapy at age 9, Liam Eyer bravely faced and beat cancer; now, in his freshman year of high school in San Jose, Liam aims to play golf in college and become a pediatric oncologist.

programme.title: Home Course Advantage
programme.desc: Immigrating from Somalia, Rashid Ibrahim came to the United States with nothing; all he had was a dream and the hope of a better life for his family; it wasn't until he found the game of golf that the dream began to feel like reality.

programme.title: Home Course Advantage
programme.desc: Malia Loo was introduced to the game of golf by her father David, and since she was a little girl, he's been her swing coach, mentor, and caddy.

programme.title: Home Course Advantage
programme.desc: While chasing his dream of playing college golf, Wyatt Worthington experienced overt prejudice which led him to a bout of paralyzing depression.

programme.title: Home Course Advantage

programme.desc: A journey to explore golf's leading teachers, players and influencers.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Todd presents the structure of his teaching, taking Chris all the way from developing a correct motion, to ways to implement on-course pressure into practice.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como travels to the Athletic Motion Golf Warehouse in Cartersville, GA where he joins the brains behind AMG, Mike Granato and Shaun Webb.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Scott Hamilton presents his analytical yet simple teaching style, and brings in a couple of his students to show how he molded their swings.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como is in Celebration, Florida where he joins John Montgomery, golf social media extraordinaire.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como is in Lake Mary, Florida at the headquarters of Top Speed Golf along with its co-founder, Clay Ballard.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.sub-title: Dr. Gio Valiante's Mental Game Blueprint
programme.desc: Chris Como is joined by some of the best in the golf psychology game, Dr. Gio Valiante and Ina Kim-Schaad, at Hawk's Landing Golf Club in Orlando, Florida.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.sub-title: Dr. Rob Neal's Wedge Play Mastery
programme.desc: Chris Como is in Orlando, Florida at Orange Lake Resort where he is talking short game with Dr. Rob Neal and Layne Savoie.

programme.title: Nathalie Filler Sheehan: Breaking 100
programme.desc: Learn the keys to keeping it in play, off the tee, how to hole more putts and everything in between.

programme.title: Martin Hall: Breaking 90
programme.desc: Martin Hall explains why breaking 90 is both technical and tactical.

programme.title: Martin Chuck: Breaking 80
programme.desc: Martin Chuck gives players all the tools they need to shoot in the 70s.

programme.title: Devan Bonebrake: Breaking Par
programme.desc: If players are on the edge of red numbers, Devan Bonebrake will give them the tools to get there.

programme.title: 9 Shots With Rory
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy covers hitting the nine key shots in golf from different positions on the course needed to shoot lower scores and impress friends.

programme.title: The Skill Code
programme.desc: Cameron McCormick gives advice to gain more distance from the tee and help those with reduced mobility.
